entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero with temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain mixed with snow beginning overnight. Fog patches overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. Low zero with temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 50 to 70 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 60 gusting to 90 in the morning then southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
